title: Author! Author!
description:
"Author! Author!" a comedy/drama starring Al Pacino, Tuesday Weld and Dyan Cannon

While facing the stress of his play being produced on Broadway, a playwright deals with having to raise his son, his stepdaughters, and his stepsons.

720 x 480

Mono

Color

MKV Matroska file

4.3 gb

30 fps

Spoken language: English

Subtitles: English, Spanish, French

Plays well on VLC Player running on Ubuntu 14.04, haven't tried it with anything else
